alert.note: Alert for Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 10:36PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Upper Keys in Monroe County through 1115 PM EDT... At 1035 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Plantation, or 13 miles south of Key Largo, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Key Largo, Plantation, Teatable Key, Rock Harbor, Upper Matecumbe Key, Windley Key, Lower Matecumbe Key and Islamorada. This includes US 1 between mile markers 76 and 100. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
